Table of Contents

Name

need - check and optionally compile software for NEMO

Synopsis

need [-m] [-s] program(s)

Description

need reports if an executable is present in $NEMOBIN, and by using the -m flag (optionally) will attempt to install it if not present. If an executable is already present, it is not installed again. If you want to override that, use mknemo(8NEMO) .

The -s flag can be used to keep the script silent during execution.

See Also

mknemo(8NEMO)

Author

Peter Teuben $NEMO/src/scripts/need    script

Update History


2-apr-97    V1.0: doc created           PJT
